title: Double Feature 3: The Stalker and The Hypnotic Spy
overview: In “The Stalker“, Dawn Murphy stars as a young girl who’s being stalked by a sadistic burglar. He’s not just satisfied with stealing her things, he must drug her first! Druggings include chloroform, darts, and a needle! Will she survive? Plus see our first underwater footage! In “The Hypnotic Spy“, Deana stars as Natasha, a spy out to obtain the secret formula for a new energy source. Dawn Murphy plays the unfortunate scientist who developed the formula and who is kidnapped by Natasha. Will Debbie D and Tina Krause, as an FBI Agent and policewoman, respectively, be able to save Dawn or will they all die horrible deaths?
